name: Aspect of the Moon
description: I don't need sleep nor can be forced to by any means; I can rest while doing light activity

prereqeval.body: function(v) { return GetFeatureChoice('class', 'warlock', 'pact boon') == 'pact of the tome'; }

text: Nothing can force me to sleep

_displayName: Aspect of the Moon (prereq: Pact of the Tome)

name: Cloak of Flies
description:
As a bonus action, I can surround myself with a 5-ft radius magical aura of buzzing flies
   It lasts until I'm incapacitated or dismiss it as a bonus action; Total cover block the aura
   The aura grants me adv. on Cha (Intimidation), but disadv. on all other Cha checks
   Creatures starting their turn in the aura take my Cha mod (min 0) in poison damage
_displayName: Cloak of Flies (prereq: level 5 warlock)

name: Eldritch Smite
description:
Once per turn when I hit a creature with my pact weapon, I can empower the strike
   By expending a warlock spell slot, the creature takes extra damage and is knocked prone
   It takes 1d8 force damage and another 1d8 force damage per level of the spell slot
   The target is only knocked prone if it is Huge or smaller

prereqeval.body: function(v) { return classes.known.warlock.level >= 5 && GetFeatureChoice('class', 'warlock', 'pact boon') == 'pact of the blade'; }

_displayName: Eldritch Smite (prereq: level 5 warlock, Pact of the Blade)

name: Ghostly Gaze
description:
As an action, I can gain darkvision, and the ability to see through solid objects, out to 30 ft
   Objects appear ghostly to me; This lasts up to 1 minute, while I'm concentrating on this
_displayName: Ghostly Gaze (prereq: level 7 warlock)

name: Gift of the Depths
description:
I can breathe underwater and I have a swim speed equal to my walking speed
   Once per long rest, I can cast Water Breathing without using a spell slot (PHB 287)
_displayName: Gift of the Depths (prereq: level 5 warlock)

name: Gift of the Ever-Living Ones
description: When I regain HP while my familiar is within 100 ft, I regain the max the dice can roll

prereqeval.body: function(v) { return GetFeatureChoice('class', 'warlock', 'pact boon') == 'pact of the chain'; }

_displayName: Gift of the Ever-Living Ones (prereq: Pact of the Chain)

name: Grasp of Hadar
description: Once per turn when my Eldritch Blast hits a creature, I can move it 10 ft closer to me

atkAdd: When I hit a creature with my Eldritch Blast cantrip once or more times in a turn, I can move it in a straight line 10 ft closer to me.

_displayName: Grasp of Hadar (prereq: Eldritch Blast cantrip)

name: Improved Pact Weapon
description:
I can use any pact weapon I create as my spellcasting focus for warlock spells
   Any pact weapon I create is a +1 magic weapon, if it isn't already a +1 magic weapon
   I can now also conjure a shortbow, longbow, or light or heavy crossbow as my pact weapon

prereqeval.body: function(v) { return GetFeatureChoice('class', 'warlock', 'pact boon') == 'pact of the blade'; }

atkCalc:
If I include the word 'Pact' in a the name of a melee weapon, shortbow, longbow, light crossbow, or heavy crossbow, it will be treated as my Pact Weapon.
 • If my Pact Weapon doesn't already include a magical bonus in its name and is not a magic weapon with at least a +1 bonus, the calculation will add +1 to its To Hit and Damage.

_displayName: Improved Pact Weapon (prereq: Pact of the Blade)

name: Lance of Lethargy
description:
Once per turn when my Eldritch Blast hits a creature, I can reduce its speed by 10 ft
   This speed reduction lasts until the end of my next turn

atkAdd: Once on each of my turns when I hit a creature with my Eldritch Blast cantrip, I can reduce its speed by 10 ft until the end of my next turn.

_displayName: Lance of Lethargy (prereq: Eldritch Blast cantrip)

name: Maddening Hex
description:
As a bonus action, I cause pain around a target hexed by me that I can see within 30 ft
   It and any of my choice I can see in 5 ft of it take my Cha mod (min 1) in psychic damage
   The Hex spell and all of my warlock features that curse are considered a hex for this
submenu: [improves Hex spell or warlock feature that curses]
_displayName: Maddening Hex (prereq: level 5 warlock, Hex spell or warlock feature that curses)

name: Relentless Hex
description:
As a bonus action, I can teleport to a target hexed by me that I can see within 30 ft
   I teleport up to 30 ft to an unoccupied space that I can see within 5 ft of the target
submenu: [improves Hex spell or warlock feature that curses]
_displayName: Relentless Hex (prereq: level 7 warlock, Hex spell or warlock feature that curses)

name: Shroud of Shadow
description: I can cast Invisibility at will, without using spell slots (PHB 254)

invisibility.description: 1 crea invisible; attacking/casting makes the crea visible; anything worn/carried also invisible
invisibility.changes: With the Shroud of Shadow invocation I can cast Invisibility at will, but when I do so I am unable to cast it using a higher level spell slot.

_displayName: Shroud of Shadow (prereq: level 15 warlock)

name: Tomb of Levistus
description:
As a reaction when I take damage, I can entomb myself in ice until the end of my turn
   During, I get 10 temp. HP per warlock level, which I use to absorb the triggering damage
   After, till the ice is gone, I also get vulnerability to fire, 0 speed, and am incapacitated
_displayName: Tomb of Levistus (prereq: level 5 warlock)

name: Trickster's Escape
description: Once per long rest, I can cast Freedom of Movement on myself without using a spell slot

freedom of movement.description: Magic can't reduce my speed, paralyze or restrain me; I can use 5 ft to escape nonmagical restrains
freedom of movement.changes: With the Trickster's Escape invocation I can cast Freedom of Movement, but only on myself.

_displayName: Trickster's Escape (prereq: level 7 warlock)

name: Bond of the Talisman
description:
As an action, I can teleport to the unoccupied space closest to the wearer of my talisman
   The talisman's wearer can do the same to teleport to me; Only works if both on same plane
_displayName: Bond of the Talisman (prereq: level 12 warlock, Pact of the Talisman)

name: Eldritch Mind
description: I have advantage on my Constitution saving throws to maintain concentration on a spell
_displayName: Eldritch Mind

name: Far Scribe
description:
My book of shadows has a new page; As an action, a creature can write its name on it
   This page can hold my Proficiency Bonus in creature names; I can remove one as an action
   I can cast Sending without a spell slot or material components, targeting one on the page
   Instead of saying the message, I write it on the page and any reply appears there as well
   This writing disappears after 1 minute; The target still hears the message in their mind

sending.description: Send 25 word message to crea named in book of shadows; it recognizes me and can respond 25 words
sending.changes: By using Far Scribe, I can cast Sending without using a spell slot or material components, but only to target one of the creatures that wrote their name in my book of shadows. Instead of speaking the message, I write it in my book and any response appears there as well, lasting for 1 minute. The target still hears the message in their mind.

_displayName: Far Scribe (prereq: level 5 warlock, Pact of the Tome)

name: Gift of the Protectors
description:
My book of shadows has a new page; As an action, a creature can write its name on it
   This page can hold my Proficiency Bonus in creature names; I can remove one as an action
   If a creature whose name is on the page drops to 0 HP, it magically drops to 1 HP instead
   This doesn't work if the creature would be killed outright
_displayName: Gift of the Protectors (prereq: level 9 warlock, Pact of the Tome)

name: Investment of the Chain Master
description:
When I cast Find Familiar, the summoned create has additional benefits:
   • It gains a flying or swimming speed of 40 ft (my choice at casting)
   • As a bonus action, I can command it to take the Attack action
   • Its weapon attacks are considered magical for overcoming immunities and resistances
   • If it forces a creature to make a saving throw, it uses my spell save DC
   • As a reaction when it takes damage, I can grant it resistance against that damage

companionCallback.body: function(e,a,t,n){if("pact_of_the_chain"===n){var n="◆ Investment of the Chain Master (TCoE 71): The familiar gains 40 ft fly or swim speed (my choice), its attacks are considered magical, and it can use my spell save DC instead of its own DC's (if any).",i="fly or swim 40 ft",o=("metric"===What("Unit System")&&(n=ConvertToMetric(n,.5),i=ConvertToMetric(i,.5)),t?AddString:RemoveString);o(e+"Comp.Use.Features",n,!0),o(e+"Comp.Use.Speed",i,typePF?",\n":", ");for(var s=1;s<=3;s++){var r=e+"Comp.Use.Attack."+s,l=r+".Description",c=What(l);t&&What(r+".Weapon Selection")&&!/(,|;)? ?counts as magical/i.test(c)?AddString(l,"Counts as magical","; "):t||Value(l,c.replace(/(,|;)? ?counts as magical/i,""))}}}

companionCallback: My pact of the chain familiars gain an extra feature listing the extra bonuses they gain.

_displayName: Investment of the Chain Master (prereq: Pact of the Chain)

name: Protection of the Talisman
description: When the wearer of my talisman fails a saving throw, they can add +1d4 to the roll
_displayName: Protection of the Talisman (prereq: level 7 warlock, Pact of the Talisman)

name: Rebuke of the Talisman
description:
As a reaction when the wearer of my talisman is hit, I deal damage and push the attacker
   To be able to do this, I have to see the attacker and it has to be within 30 ft of me
   I deal it my Proficiency Bonus in psychic damage and push it 10 ft away from the talisman
_displayName: Rebuke of the Talisman (prereq: Pact of the Talisman)

name: Undying Servitude
description: Once per long rest, I can cast Animate Dead without using a spell slot
_displayName: Undying Servitude (prereq: level 5 warlock)

name: Arcane Gunslinger
description: My pact weapon can take firearm forms, and I can transform magical firearms into one

atkAdd: If I include the word 'Pact' in a firearm weapon's name, it gets treated as my Pact Weapon.

_displayName: Arcane Gunslinger (prereq: Pact of the Blade)

name: Aspect of the Moon
description: I don't need to sleep nor can be magically forced to; I can rest while doing light activity

text: Nothing can force me to sleep

_displayName: Aspect of the Moon (prereq: the Archfey patron)

name: Burning Hex
description:
As a bonus action, I can cause a target affected by my hexblade's curse to take damage
   It immediately takes fire damage equal to my Charisma modifier (min 1)
_displayName: Burning Hex (prereq: the Hexblade patron)

name: Caiphon's Beacon
description:
I gain proficiencies with the Deception and Stealth skills
   I have advantage on attack rolls against charmed creatures
_displayName: Caiphon's Beacon (prereq: the Great Old One patron)

name: Chilling Hex
description:
As a bonus action, I can swirl frost around a target affected by my hexblade's curse
   All creatures within 5 ft of the target take cold damage equal to my Cha modifier (min 1)
_displayName: Chilling Hex (prereq: the Hexblade patron)

name: Chronicle of the Raven Queen
description:
Within 1 minute of a creature's death, I can use my book of shadows to ask it 1 question
   To do this, I need to put the corpse's hand on the book and speak the question aloud
   Its spirit writes the answer, to the best of its knowledge, in blood in a language I choose
_displayName: Chronicle of the Raven Queen (prereq: the Raven Queen patron, Pact of the Tome)

name: Claw of Acamar
description:
As a pact weapon, I can create a black, lead flail with grasping tentacles for a head
   It has reach and can reduce a creature's speed to 0 on a hit until the end of my next turn
   On a hit, I can expend a spell slot to have it do +2d8 necrotic damage per spell slot level

weaponOptions.name: Claw of Acamar
weaponOptions.description: Pact weapon, reach; On hit: Reduces speed to 0, Expend spell slot for +2d8 necrotic damage per slot level

_displayName: Claw of Acamar (prereq: the Great Old One patron, Pact of the Blade)

name: Cloak of Baalzebul
description:
As a bonus action, I can conjure or dismiss a swarm of buzzing flies around me
   This gives me adv. on Cha (Intimidation) checks, but disadv. on all other Charisma checks
   Creatures starting their turn within 5 ft of me take poison damage equal to my Cha mod
_displayName: Cloak of Baalzebul (prereq: the Fiend patron)

name: Curse Bringer
description:
As a pact weapon, I can create a silver greatsword with black runes etched in the blade
   If I bring a target of my hexblade's curse to 0 HP with it, I can move the curse to another
   It can reduce a creature's speed to 0 on a hit until the end of my next turn
   On a hit, I can expend a spell slot to have it do +2d8 slashing damage per spell slot level

weaponOptions.name: Curse Bringer
weaponOptions.description: Pact weapon, heavy, two-handed; On hit: Reduces speed to 0, Expend spell slot for +2d8 slashing damage per slot level

_displayName: Curse Bringer (prereq: the Hexblade patron, Pact of the Blade)

name: Kiss of Mephistopheles
description:
As a bonus action when my Eldritch Blast hits, I can cast Fireball using a warlock spell slot
   The origin of the Fireball is the creature that was hit with my Eldritch Blast attack
_displayName: Kiss of Mephistopheles (prereq: level 5 warlock, the Fiend patron, Eldritch Blast cantrip)

name: Frost Lance
description:
When my Eldritch Blast hits a creature once or more, I can reduce its speed by 10 ft
   This speed reduction lasts until the end of my next turn

atkAdd: When I hit a creature with my Eldritch Blast cantrip once or more times in a turn, I can reduce its speed by 10 ft until the end of my next turn.

_displayName: Frost Lance (prereq: the Archfey patron, Eldritch Blast cantrip)

name: Gaze of Khirad
description: As an action, I can see through solid object out to 30 ft until the end of my current turn
_displayName: Gaze of Khirad (prereq: level 7 warlock, the Great Old One patron)

name: Grasp of Hadar
description: Once per turn when my Eldritch Blast hits a creature, I can move it 10 ft closer to me

atkAdd.body: function(e,a){"eldritch blast"==a.baseWeaponName&&(e.Description+="; Target moved 10 ft to me")}

atkAdd: When I hit a creature with my Eldritch Blast cantrip once or more times in a turn, I can move it in a straight line 10 ft closer to me.

_displayName: Grasp of Hadar (prereq: the Great Old One patron, Eldritch Blast cantrip)

name: Green Lord's Gift
description: When I regain HP, all dice for determining the HP I heal are treated as rolling maximum
_displayName: Green Lord's Gift (prereq: the Archfey patron)

name: Improved Pact Weapon
description: Any pact weapon I create is a +1 magic weapon, if it isn't already a magic weapon

atkCalc: If my Pact Weapon doesn't already include a magical bonus in its name or gets it from somewhere else and is not a magic weapon, the calculation will add +1 to its To Hit and Damage.

_displayName: Improved Pact Weapon (prereq: level 5 warlock, Pact of the Blade)

name: Mace of Dispater
description:
As a pact weapon, I can create an iron mace forged in Dis, the 2nd layer of the Nine Hells
   I can knock a target prone with it on a hit, if the target's size is Huge or smaller
   On a hit, I can expend a spell slot to have it do +2d8 force damage per spell slot level

weaponOptions.name: Mace of Dispater
weaponOptions.description: Pact weapon; On hit: knock Huge or smaller prone, Expend spell slot for +2d8 force damage per slot level

_displayName: Mace of Dispater (prereq: the Fiend patron, Pact of the Blade)

name: Moon Bow
description:
As a pact weapon, I can create a longbow that creates arrows of white wood when drawn
   Its arrows last for 1 minute; I have advantage on attack rolls against lycanthropes with it
   On a hit, I can expend a spell slot to have it do +2d8 radiant damage per spell slot level

weaponOptions.name: Moon Bow
weaponOptions.description: Pact weapon, heavy, two-handed; Adv. vs. lycanthropes; On hit, expend spell slot for +2d8 radiant damage per slot level

_displayName: Moon Bow (prereq: the Archfey patron, Pact of the Blade)

name: Path of the Seeker
description:
I ignore difficult terrain; I have advantage on saving throws against being paralyzed
   I also have advantage on checks to escape a grapple, manacles, or rope bindings
_displayName: Path of the Seeker (prereq: the Seeker patron)

name: Raven Queen's Blessing
description:
When I score a critical hit with Eldritch Blast, I can choose an ally I can see within 30 ft
   That ally can immediately expend one HD to regain HP, just like after a short rest
_displayName: Raven Queen's Blessing (prereq: the Raven Queen patron, Eldritch Blast cantrip)

name: Relentless Hex
description:
As a bonus action, I can teleport next to a target affected by my hexblade's curse
   To do so, I must see the target and the space I'm teleporting to, and be within 30 ft of it
_displayName: Relentless Hex (prereq: level 5 warlock, the Hexblade patron)

name: Sea Twins' Gift
description:
I can breathe underwater and I have a swim speed equal to my walking speed
   Once per long rest, I can cast Water Breathing using a warlock spell slot (PHB 287)
_displayName: Sea Twins' Gift (prereq: the Archfey patron)

name: Seeker's Speech
description: When I finish a long rest, I pick two languages that I know until I finish my next long rest
_displayName: Seeker's Speech (prereq: the Seeker patron)

name: Shroud of Ulban
description:
As an action, I can turn myself invisible for 1 minute
   If I attack, deal damage, or force a creature to make a save, I become visible again
   However, I only become visible at the end of the current turn
_displayName: Shroud of Ulban (prereq: level 18 warlock, the Great Old One patron)

name: Superior Pact Weapon
description: Any pact weapon I create is a +2 magic weapon, if it isn't already a magic weapon

atkCalc: If my Pact Weapon doesn't already include a magical bonus in its name or gets it from somewhere else and is not a magic weapon, the calculation will add +2 to its To Hit and Damage.

_displayName: Superior Pact Weapon (prereq: level 9 warlock, Pact of the Blade)

name: Tomb of Levistus
description:
As a reaction when I take damage, I can entomb myself in ice until the end of my turn
   I get 10 temp. HP per warlock level, which can be used to absorb the triggering damage
   Until the ice is gone, I have vulnerability to fire damage, 0 speed, and am incapacitated
_displayName: Tomb of Levistus (prereq: the Fiend patron)

name: Ultimate Pact Weapon
description: Any pact weapon I create is a +3 magic weapon, if it isn't already a magic weapon

atkCalc: If my Pact Weapon doesn't already include a magical bonus in its name or gets it from somewhere else and is not a magic weapon, the calculation will add +3 to its To Hit and Damage.

_displayName: Ultimate Pact Weapon (prereq: level 15 warlock, Pact of the Blade)

name: Frost Lance
description:
Once per turn when my Eldritch Blast hits a creature, I can reduce its speed by 10 ft
   This speed reduction lasts until the end of my next turn

atkAdd: When I hit a creature with my Eldritch Blast cantrip once or more times in a turn, I can reduce its speed by 10 ft until the end of my next turn.

_displayName: Frost Lance (prereq: Eldritch Blast cantrip)

name: Kiss of Mephistopheles
description:
As a bonus action when my Eldritch Blast hits, I can cast Fireball using a warlock spell slot
   The origin of the Fireball is the creature that was hit with my Eldritch Blast attack
_displayName: Kiss of Mephistopheles (prereq: level 5 warlock, Eldritch Blast cantrip)

name: Maddening Hex
description:
As a bonus action, I cause pain around a target affected by a hex of mine (spell/feature)
   It and any of my choice within 5 ft of it take my Cha mod (min 0) in psychic damage
_displayName: Maddening Hex (prereq: level 5 warlock)

name: Relentless Hex
description:
As a bonus action, I can teleport next to a target affected by a hex of mine (spell/feature)
   To do so, I must see the target and the space I'm teleporting to, and be within 30 ft of it
_displayName: Relentless Hex (prereq: level 7 warlock)

name: Bond of the Talisman
description:
As an action, I can teleport to the unoccupied space closest to the wearer of my talisman
   The talisman's wearer can do the same to teleport to me; Only works if both on same plane
_displayName: Bond of the Talisman (prereq: level 12 warlock, Pact of the Talisman) (ua)

name: Chain Master's Fury
description: As a bonus action, I can command my familiar to make one attack
_displayName: Chain Master's Fury (prereq: level 9 warlock, Pact of the Chain)

name: Eldritch Armor
description:
As an action, I can touch an unattended suit of armor and instantly don it
   I am proficient with this suit of armor until it is removed
_displayName: Eldritch Armor (prereq: Pact of the Blade)

name: Eldritch Mind
description: I have advantage on my Constitution saving throws to maintain concentration on a spell
_displayName: Eldritch Mind (prereq: Pact of the Tome)

name: Far Scribe
description:
My book of shadows has a new page; As an action, a creature can write its name on it
   This page can hold my Cha mod (min 1) in creature names; I can remove one as an action
   I can cast Sending without a spell slot or material components, targeting one on the page
   Instead of saying the message, I write it on the page and any reply appears there as well
   This writing disappears after 1 minute; The target still hears the message in their mind

sending.description: Send 25 word message to crea named in book of shadows; it recognizes me and can respond 25 words
sending.changes: By using Far Scribe, I can cast Sending without using a spell slot or material components, but only to target one of the creatures that wrote their name in my book of shadows. Instead of speaking the message, I write it in my book and any response appears there as well, lasting for 1 minute. The target still hears the message in their mind.

_displayName: Far Scribe (prereq: level 5 warlock, Pact of the Tome) (ua)

name: Gift of the Protectors
description:
My book of shadows has a new page; As an action, a creature can write its name on it
   This page can hold my Cha mod (min 1) in creature names; I can remove one as an action
   If a creature whose name is on the page drops to 0 HP, it magically drops to 1 HP instead
   This doesn't work if the creature would be killed outright
_displayName: Gift of the Protectors (prereq: level 9 warlock, Pact of the Tome) (ua)

When I cast Find Familiar, the summoned create has additional benefits:
   • It gains a flying or swimming speed of 40 ft (my choice at casting)
   • It no longer needs to breathe
   • Its weapon attacks are considered magical for overcoming immunities and resistances
   • If it forces a creature to make a saving throw, it uses my spell save DC

_displayName: Investment of the Chain Master (prereq: Pact of the Chain) (ua)
